pages.title: Home
pages.purpose: Introduce the Kamina Digital Library system, explaining its purpose as a FastAPI-based REST API for digital library management with CRUD operations, book search, loan management, and JWT authentication

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through setting up and running the Kamina Digital Library, from installation to first API request

pages.title: Prerequisites and Installation
pages.purpose: Detail the required dependencies (Python, PostgreSQL, pip packages) and step-by-step installation instructions including virtual environment setup

pages.title: Configuration
pages.purpose: Explain the .env file configuration including DATABASE_URL, SECRET_KEY, ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES, and other environment variables

pages.title: Database Setup
pages.purpose: Walk through creating the PostgreSQL database and running the create_tables.py script to initialize the schema

pages.title: Running the Application
pages.purpose: Explain how to start the Uvicorn server, access the API, and explore the Swagger UI documentation interface

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Provide comprehensive documentation of the system's architectural design, component organization, and data flow patterns, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.purpose: Present the high-level architecture including the layered design (API, Service, CRUD, Model layers) and how components interact, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Request Lifecycle
pages.purpose: Trace how an HTTP request flows through the system from API router through services, CRUD operations, and database access, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Layer Architecture Deep Dive
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of each architectural layer (routers, services, schemas, CRUD, models) with examples from the codebase, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Core Features
pages.purpose: Document the main functional capabilities of the digital library system including entity management and business operations, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: User Management
pages.purpose: Explain user registration, authentication, profile management, and CRUD operations with validation rules and password security, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Book Catalog Management
pages.purpose: Detail book creation, updates, deletion, and inventory management including author validation and relationship handling, threre is no loan.py

pages.title: Book Search Functionality
pages.purpose: Explain the search feature that allows finding books by title, author name, or publication date with examples

pages.title: API Reference
pages.purpose: Comprehensive reference documentation for all API endpoints including request/response formats and authentication requirements

pages.title: Authentication Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document /auth/login and /auth/me endpoints with request formats, response structures, and token handling

pages.title: User Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document all user-related endpoints including registration, retrieval, updates, and deletion with validation rules

pages.title: Book Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document book management endpoints including CRUD operations and search functionality with query parameter examples

pages.title: Author and Loan Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document author management and loan system endpoints including borrowing, returning, and loan history operations

pages.title: Security and Authentication
pages.purpose: Explain the security architecture including JWT implementation, password hashing, and authorization mechanisms

pages.title: JWT Authentication
pages.purpose: Detail JWT token generation, validation, expiration handling, and how tokens secure API endpoints

pages.title: Password Security
pages.purpose: Explain password hashing with encryption, validation logic, strength requirements, and secure storage practices

pages.title: Data Models and Schemas
pages.purpose: Document the data structures including database models and Pydantic validation schemas that define the system's data contracts

pages.title: Database Models
pages.purpose: Detail the SQLAlchemy ORM models for Users, Authors, Books, and Loans including fields, relationships, and constraints

pages.title: Pydantic Validation Schemas
pages.purpose: Explain the Pydantic schemas used for request validation and response serialization with examples from UserCreate, UserOut, etc.

pages.title: Testing
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to the test infrastructure, test suites, and testing practices used to ensure code quality

pages.title: Test Infrastructure
pages.purpose: Explain the pytest configuration, fixtures (session, client), temporary database setup, and dependency override mechanisms

pages.title: Test Suites Overview
pages.purpose: Document the test_auth, test_users, and test_books test suites including what they test and how to run them with coverage

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Guide for developers working on the codebase including project structure, coding patterns, and contribution guidelines
